items.title: Conduct user research
items.description: Interview users, create surveys, and gather insights to understand user needs and behaviors.

items.title: Create wireframes and mockups
items.description: Design low and high-fidelity prototypes to visualize interface layouts and interactions.

items.title: Design user interfaces
items.description: Create visually appealing and functional interface designs following design system guidelines.

items.title: Develop user personas
items.description: Create detailed user personas based on research data to guide design decisions.

items.title: Map user journeys
items.description: Document user workflows and touchpoints to identify pain points and optimization opportunities.

items.title: Conduct usability testing
items.description: Test prototypes with real users to identify usability issues and gather feedback.

items.title: Collaborate with developers
items.description: Work closely with engineering teams to ensure design implementation matches specifications.

items.title: Maintain design systems
items.description: Create and update component libraries, style guides, and design tokens for consistency.

items.title: Analyze user analytics
items.description: Review user behavior data and metrics to inform design decisions and improvements.

items.title: Create information architecture
items.description: Organize content and navigation structures for optimal user comprehension and flow.

items.title: Design responsive layouts
items.description: Create adaptive designs that work seamlessly across different devices and screen sizes.

items.title: Conduct competitive analysis
items.description: Research competitor products and industry standards to identify design opportunities.

items.title: Facilitate design workshops
items.description: Lead brainstorming sessions and design sprints with stakeholders and team members.

items.title: Create accessibility guidelines
items.description: Ensure designs meet accessibility standards and are usable by people with disabilities.

items.title: Present design concepts
items.description: Communicate design rationale and solutions to stakeholders and decision makers.

items.title: Optimize conversion flows
items.description: Improve user journey paths to increase conversion rates and reduce abandonment.

items.title: Design micro-interactions
items.description: Create subtle animations and feedback mechanisms to enhance user experience.

items.title: Validate design decisions
items.description: Use A/B testing and user feedback to measure design effectiveness and impact.

items.title: Create design documentation
items.description: Document design processes, decisions, and specifications for team reference.

items.title: Mentor junior designers
items.description: Guide and train less experienced designers on best practices and design methodologies.

items.title: Coordinate user testing
items.description: Plan, schedule, and manage user testing sessions to gather actionable insights.

items.title: Design brand guidelines
items.description: Establish visual identity standards including colors, typography, and brand elements.
